For the obsolete player background, see [[Paladin]].'' {{list of | holy monsters}} {{Flavour|A pious armoured warrior fighting in the service of the Shining One. ---- "Now shame to knighthood, brothers!
Must Summer plead in vain?
And shall I wait till others
My crown of sunshine gain?
Alone this day I'll dare the fray,
Alone this day I'll win;
In me my queen shall find, I ween,
A sturdy paladin." -Katharine Lee Bates, "The Little Knight in Green". ca. 1890.}} ==Useful Info== '''Paladins''' are powerful warriors with [[holy]] attributes; they can be considered the holy analogue to [[hell knight]]s. They are constantly surrounded by a 2-tile halo [[aura]] and generally come with heavy armour, a shield of some sort, and a weapon of [[holy wrath]] (generally a [[blessed blade]]). While they are legitimate threats to [[undead]] and [[demonspawn]] characters, they are extremely rare, generally only appearing on holy-themed [[Pandemonium]] and [[Ziggurat]] floors. ==Tips & Tricks== *If you want to get a blessed blade without having to worship [[the Shining One]], paladins often carry them. *As with other holy monsters, killing a paladin may result in the Shining One smiting you with [[Cleansing Flame]]. If you're very low on health, avoid killing any paladins lest you suddenly meet an untimely end. ==History== Paladins were removed in [[0.13]]. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]] [[Category:Human]]
